The script attempts to backup the DB with pg_dump connecting to localhost:5432 using user "user" and a password prompt (-W flag used).

Next, I will attempt to access the local PostgreSQL database using this password.

I will run:

PGPASSWORD=p@ssw0rd psql -U user -h localhost -p 5432

to connect to the database. Then I will enumerate tables and data for sensitive info or access vectors.
